mapper.insert: insert into tb_wenjianguanli ( filetitle, filetext, filecreator, createtime) values ( #{filetitle}, #{filetext}, #{filecreator}, now())
mapper.select: select a.fileid, a.filetitle, a.filetext, DATE_FORMAT(a.createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as createtime from tb_wenjianguanli a where a.fileid = #{fileid}
mapper.update: update tb_wenjianguanli set filetitle=#{filetitle}, filetext=#{filetext}, updatetime=now() where fileid=#{fileid}
update tb_wenjianguanli set state = 0 where fileid in (${_parameter})
